Package com.here.platform.location.core.geospatial.javadsl

Interface GeoCoordinateAdapter<GC>

Type Parameters:
GC - The type that can provide latitude/longitude
All Known Implementing Classes:
MapQuadGeoCoordinateAdapter
public interface GeoCoordinateAdapter<GC>
Extracts latitude and longitude for some type.

Its usage is optional when using types that implement GeoCoordinateHolder.
